text.text: Tony Yan has been investing in residential and commercial real estate (equity and debt financing) in Canada for the past five years. An entrepreneur by birth and upbringing, Tony started his first business in Vancouver at the age of 23. Tony has now permanently settled in West Vancouver and focuses on his relationships with international real estate brokerages, identifying potential properties for acquisition. He is responsible for identifying projects, evaluating their current financial situation and potential upside, networking, marketing, construction and renovation, and administration.
